content: in a case that took place in harju county court a decision was issued on 25112022 the court ruled that one party is responsible for covering the procedural costs the case lasted for five months the court referred to its final resolution as court dec the plaintiff vš claims to be married to someone named xxxx and acquired a property specifically an apartment the plaintiff is involved in a case related to a marriage that ended in 1992 and is seeking to establish ownership of the apartment as separate property the plaintiff acquired the apartment through privatization and a contract was signed in 1994 the defendant inherited a part of the apartment ownership according to the deceased všs will the plaintiff is requesting the court to establish that the apartment belongs to them and is part of the deceaseds estate the court has initiated proceedings on this matter in september 2022 a lawsuit was served to the defendant the defendant responded to the claim the supreme court ordered a lawsuit to identify the composition of the inheritance the plaintiff has the right to file a lawsuit to establish their legal interest if the defendant fails to respond within the given deadline a default judgment can be issued in this case the defendant was responsible for the procedural costs but this decision can be contested and determined by the appealing court
